EmailTemplate.name: Your Stimulus Package Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, do you need funds for your business?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Business' Stimulus Package a Merchant Cash Advance
HOW IT WORKS: We pay you for your future Visa™/MasterCard™ sales up front and we get paid back with a small fixed percentage of your daily Visa™/MasterCard™ receipts until your obligation is fulfilled!
Our service is aligned with the success of your business - we only get paid when you get paid.
EASY ... SMART ... FAST
Approved and funded within 10 business days. We offer 50% more than our competitors. Simple, no cost application. No personal guarantees. No fixed monthly payments. Get a same day quote.
USE CASH TO:
Purchase New Equipment Purchase Inventory Support a Seasonal Trend Expand or Remodel Pay Off Debt Emergency Funding
"Whether you're looking for convenient working capital or you've been declined for a small business loan, our merchant cash advance is the perfect solution!"
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} Account Executive
Phone: {!Lead.OwnerPhone} Email: {!Lead.OwnerEmail}
